name: Petite Pumpkin
description: Sweet and petite, this pumpkin looks good enough to eat!
suggested_yarn: The Yarns of Rhichard Devrieze Fynn
full_text: Sweet and petite, this pumpkin looks good enough to eat! A tiny little softie for small hands to hold or for Fall decor. Be creative and try some of Rhichard Devrieze stippled and variegated minis for added flair. Cut a small twig from fallen timber for the stem or add a snippet of a cinnamon stick. Or use stash yarn for your tiny little stem. Please enjoy this FREE knitting pattern and if you would like future notice of more FREE patterns, follow me at @muskokayarn on Instagram and @muskokayarnconnection on Facebook.
